message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $1100000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your confidence in its value. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $1050000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider $1000000 as a fair price for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1000000. However, I'm still a bit short of my target. My next counteroffer is $1075000.
I appreciate your efforts to find a common ground, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I am willing to pay $1025000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm getting close to my target, but I need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible. My next counteroffer is $1090000.
I understand your position, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I am willing to offer $1060000 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1060000. However, I'm still not quite there. My next counteroffer is $1095000.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer $1075000 for the product.
